publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2412.1 Tommy Sheridan: Conduct of the First Minister-As an amendment to motion (S1M-2412) in the name of David McLetchie, leave out from "and calls upon" and insert "and recommends that the Standards Committee conduct a full and thorough investigation of the First Minister in relation to the Code of Conduct for Members of the Scottish Parliament, paragraph 1.2 of Section 1, which states "The Scottish electorate has a high expectation of members of the Scottish Parliament and the way in which they should act in their relationships with their constituents and in the Parliament. Members must meet those expectations by ensuring that their conduct is above reproach and worthy of the trust of the electorate." and paragraph 1.3, which states "The word 'Integrity' is inscribed on the mace which is a symbol of authority of the Parliament; it is one of a number of principles which must be observed in all that members do." "
